Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Interface ControllerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
MatchController
public interface ControllerInterface
This interface defines the controller's method that view can call.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    State getGameState()  
    java.util.List<Error> onChallengerChooseGods​(java.lang.String playerUsername, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> godIds)
    This method is triggered in the initial phase, when the challenger choose the gods for the match.
    java.util.List<Error> onChallengerChooseStartingPlayer​(java.lang.String playerUsername, java.lang.String chosenPlayer)
    This method is triggered in the initial phase, when the challenger chooses the player starting the match.
    java.util.List<Error> onNewPlayer​(java.lang.String playerUsername, Color workerColor)
    This method is triggered when a new player logs in.
    java.util.List<Error> onPlayerChooseGod​(java.lang.String playerUsername, java.lang.Integer godId)
    This method is triggered when the player selects his god.
    java.util.List<Error> onPlayerEndTurn​(java.lang.String playerUsername)
    This method is triggered when the player ends his turn.
    java.util.List<Error> onPlayerSetWorker​(java.lang.String playerUsername, java.lang.String workerGender, int x, int y)
    This method is triggered in the initial phase, when the player places his workers on the board.
    java.lang.String onStartGame()
    This method is triggered when the first player starts the game.
    java.util.List<Error> onWorkerBuild​(java.lang.String playerUsername, java.lang.String workerGender, int x, int y, int level)
    This method is triggered when the player builds something.
    java.util.List<Error> onWorkerMove​(java.lang.String playerUsername, java.lang.String workerGender, int x, int y)
    This method is triggered when the player moves his worker.
    void sendAnswerBuildAccepted​(java.lang.String playerUsername)
    This method call the method on virtualView that provides to send an Answer for an accepted build.
    void sendAnswerEndOfTurnAccepted​(java.lang.String playerUsername)
    This method call the method on virtualView that provides to send an Answer for an accepted end of turn.
    void sendAnswerMoveAccepted​(java.lang.String playerUsername)
    This method call the method on virtualView that provides to send an Answer for an accepted move.
    void sendNextToDoChoseGod()
    This method call the method on virtualView that provides to send a message to notify a client that he has to chose his god.
    void sendNextToDoChoseStartingPlayer()
    This method call the method on virtualView that provides to send a message to notify a client that he has to chose the starting player.
    void sendNextToDoSetupWorkerOnBoard​(java.lang.String gender)
    This method call the method on virtualView that provides to send a message to notify a client that he has to place a worker on board.
    void sendNextToDoTurn()
    This method call the method on virtualView that provides to send a message to notify a client that he has to play his turn.
    void setViewInterface​(ViewInterface viewInterface)  

  • Method Details

    • onNewPlayer

      java.util.List<Error> onNewPlayer​(java.lang.String playerUsername, Color workerColor)
      This method is triggered when a new player logs in.
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - the username of the new player.
      workerColor - the worker's color for the new player.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the errors (if there were some): LOGIN_COLOR_NOT_AVAILABLE : the color was taken by another player LOGIN_USERNAME_NOT_AVAILABLE : the username was taken by another player LOGIN_TOO_MANY_PLAYERS : there are already three players connected

    • onStartGame

      java.lang.String onStartGame()
      This method is triggered when the first player starts the game.
      Returns:
      a String containing the challenger username.

    • onChallengerChooseGods

      java.util.List<Error> onChallengerChooseGods​(java.lang.String playerUsername, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> godIds)
      This method is triggered in the initial phase, when the challenger choose the gods for the match.
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - username of the player making the request
      godIds - contains the ids of the chosen gods.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the errors (if there were some): SETUP_IS_NOT_CHALLENGER : only the challenger chan choose the gods

    • onPlayerChooseGod

      java.util.List<Error> onPlayerChooseGod​(java.lang.String playerUsername, java.lang.Integer godId)
      This method is triggered when the player selects his god.
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - username of the player making the request
      godId - id of the god chosen
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the errors (if there were some): INGAME_NOT_YOUR_TURN : player cannot choose the god if it is not his turn

    • onChallengerChooseStartingPlayer

      java.util.List<Error> onChallengerChooseStartingPlayer​(java.lang.String playerUsername, java.lang.String chosenPlayer)
      This method is triggered in the initial phase, when the challenger chooses the player starting the match.
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - username of the player making the request
      chosenPlayer - username of the starting player
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the errors (if there were some): SETUP_IS_NOT_CHALLENGER : only the challenger chan choose the starting player INGAME_NOT_YOUR_TURN : player cannot choose the god if it is not his turn

    • onPlayerSetWorker

      java.util.List<Error> onPlayerSetWorker​(java.lang.String playerUsername, java.lang.String workerGender, int x, int y)
      This method is triggered in the initial phase, when the player places his workers on the board.
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - username of the player making the request
      workerGender - gender of the worker placed
      x - is the x square coordinate where the worker is set
      y - is the y square coordinate where the worker is set
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the errors (if there were some): SETUP_WORKER_ON_OCCUPIED_SQUARE : cannot set the worker on square that is not free INGAME_NOT_YOUR_TURN : player cannot place a worker if it is not his turn SETUP_WORKER_ALREADY_SET : cannot set the worker if it's already on a square

    • onWorkerMove

      java.util.List<Error> onWorkerMove​(java.lang.String playerUsername, java.lang.String workerGender, int x, int y)
      This method is triggered when the player moves his worker.
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - username of the player making the request
      workerGender - gender of the worker moved
      x - is the x square coordinate where the worker wants to move
      y - is the y square coordinate where the worker wants to move
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the errors (if there were some): INGAME_NOT_YOUR_TURN : player cannot move a worker if it is not his turn INGAME_WRONG_WORKER : player cannot move the inactive worker

    • onWorkerBuild

      java.util.List<Error> onWorkerBuild​(java.lang.String playerUsername, java.lang.String workerGender, int x, int y, int level)
      This method is triggered when the player builds something.
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - username of the player making the request
      workerGender - gender of the worker moved
      x - is the x square coordinate where the worker wants to build
      y - is the y square coordinate where the worker wants to build
      level - is the level that the worker wants to build
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the errors (if there were some): INGAME_NOT_YOUR_TURN : player cannot move a worker if it is not his turn INGAME_WRONG_WORKER : player cannot move the inactive worker

    • onPlayerEndTurn

      java.util.List<Error> onPlayerEndTurn​(java.lang.String playerUsername)
      This method is triggered when the player ends his turn. It sets the current player to the next player. It check if the next player can move.
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - username of the player making the request
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the errors (if there were some): INGAME_NOT_YOUR_TURN : player cannot move a worker if it is not his turn

    • getGameState

      State getGameState()

    • setViewInterface

      void setViewInterface​(ViewInterface viewInterface)

    • sendAnswerMoveAccepted

      void sendAnswerMoveAccepted​(java.lang.String playerUsername)
      This method call the method on virtualView that provides to send an Answer for an accepted move.
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - is the player who is waiting for an answer.

    • sendAnswerBuildAccepted

      void sendAnswerBuildAccepted​(java.lang.String playerUsername)
      This method call the method on virtualView that provides to send an Answer for an accepted build.
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - is the player who is waiting for an answer.

    • sendAnswerEndOfTurnAccepted

      void sendAnswerEndOfTurnAccepted​(java.lang.String playerUsername)
      This method call the method on virtualView that provides to send an Answer for an accepted end of turn.
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - is the player who is waiting for an answer.

    • sendNextToDoChoseGod

      void sendNextToDoChoseGod()
      This method call the method on virtualView that provides to send a message to notify a client that he has to chose his god.

    • sendNextToDoChoseStartingPlayer

      void sendNextToDoChoseStartingPlayer()
      This method call the method on virtualView that provides to send a message to notify a client that he has to chose the starting player.

    • sendNextToDoSetupWorkerOnBoard

      void sendNextToDoSetupWorkerOnBoard​(java.lang.String gender)
      This method call the method on virtualView that provides to send a message to notify a client that he has to place a worker on board.

    • sendNextToDoTurn

      void sendNextToDoTurn()
      This method call the method on virtualView that provides to send a message to notify a client that he has to play his turn.
